message_history.content:
A conversation between User and Assistant. The user asks a question, and the Assistant answers it. The Assistant analyzes the given question and information in the mind, retains important relevant information, calls a search engine to find necessary information, accesses web pages with certain urls, and provides the user with the answer. The Assistant conducts search by <search> query </search>, access certain url by <access> url </access>, and the top search results and url page will be returned between <information> and </information>.  The reasoning processes are enclosed within <think> </think>. Finally, the Assistant provides answer inside <answer> and </answer>, i.e. <answer> answer here </answer>. If there are multiple queries, ensure all answers are enclosed within <answer> </answer>, seperated with comma. 

Note: the question is a valid question and you should try to find a correct answer. 

User: Curious about the birth rate, death rate, and the overall population of the United States. Please gather the following information on yearly basis from 2012-2023 (including 2012 and 2023). 

Please organize the results in one Markdown table with the following columns:
Year, Total Population(Million), Male Population(Million), Female Population(Million), Birth Rate, Death Rate
Note: both birth rate and death rate indicate the number of live births/deaths occurring during the year, per 1,000 population. 

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.

Assistant: 
<think>

To find the birth rate, death rate, and population of the United States from 2012 to 2023, I'll search through reliable sources. </think>
<search> what is the birth rate death rate and population of the united states 2012-2023</search>

Search query: what is the birth rate death rate and population of the united states 2012-2023
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data-visualization/birth-to-death-ratios/natality-mortality-trends.htm):
Natality and Mortality Trends in the United States, 2000–2023 - CDC These charts describe trends in births and deaths in the United States from 2000 through the most current available year.

[Doc 2](https://www.macrotrends.net/global-metrics/countries/usa/united-states/birth-rate):
U.S. Birth Rate (1950-2025) - Macrotrends U.S. birth rate for 2024 was 12.01, a 12.23% increase from 2023. · U.S. birth rate for 2023 was 10.70, a 2.73% decline from 2022. · U.S. birth rate for 2022 was ...

[Doc 3](https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SP.DYN.CBRT.IN?locations=US):
Birth rate, crude (per 1,000 people) - United States | Data Birth rate, crude (per 1,000 people) - United States · Survival to age 65, female (% of cohort) · Death rate, crude (per 1,000 people) · Contraceptive prevalence, ...

[Doc 4](https://www.census.gov/library/stories/2023/12/state-population-estimates.html):
Births Now Outpacing Deaths in Over Half the States New population estimates show that 19 states had more deaths than births in 2023, down from 25 in 2022.

[Doc 5](https://data.who.int/countries/840):
United States of America - WHO Data In the United States of America, the current population is 343,477,335 as of 2023 with a projected increase of 11% to 380,846,910 by 2050. Population growth ...
I need to find specific data for each year's population, male and female populations, and birth and death rates from 2012 to 2023. I'll narrow down my search to more specific datasets.

</think>
<search> united states population by year 2012-2023</search>

Search query: united states population by year 2012-2023
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.macrotrends.net/global-metrics/countries/usa/united-states/population):
U.S. Population (1950-2025) Total population for the United States in 2023 was 334,914,895, a 0.49% increase from 2022. Total population for the United States in 2022 was 333,271,411, a ...

[Doc 2](https://www.multpl.com/united-states-population/table/by-year):
US Population by Year US Population by Year ; Jul 1, 2019, 328.24 million ; Jul 1, 2018, 326.69 million ; Jul 1, 2017, 324.99 million ; Jul 1, 2016, 322.94 million.

[Doc 3](https://www.census.gov/data/tables/time-series/dec/popchange-data-text.html):
Historical Population Change Data (1910-2020) Historical Population Change Data (1910-2020) ; Resident Population, 57,609,148, 55,317,240, 53,594,378, 50,809,229 ...

[Doc 4](https://usafacts.org/data/topics/people-society/population-and-demographics/our-changing-population/):
US population by year, race, age, ethnicity, & more The US population increased 12 out of the 12 years between year 2010 and year 2022. Its largest annual population increase was 1% between 2019 and 2020.

[Doc 5](https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SP.POP.TOTL?locations=US):
Population, total - United States Most Recent Year. Most Recent Value. United States. 2024. 340,110,988. All Countries and Economies. Country. Most Recent Year. Most Recent Value (Thousands).
I'll now search for male and female populations separately and birth/death rates for the specified years.

</think>
<search> united states male population by year 2012-2023</search>

Search query: united states male population by year 2012-2023
Result: [Doc 1](https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SP.POP.TOTL.MA.ZS?locations=US):
Population, male (% of total population) - United States | Data Population, male (% of total population) - United States from The World Bank: Data.

DP05: Male by Geography - Census Bureau Bar Chart Census Bureau data bar chart of Male by Geography. Data from 2023 American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates, table DP05.

[Doc 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demographics_of_the_United_States):
Demographics of the United States - Wikipedia Demographics of the United States ; 0.98 male(s)/female (2023 est.) · 1.045 male(s)/female (2022) · 1.05 male(s)/female (2023 est.) · 1.01 male(s)/female (2023 est.).

U.S. population by sex 1980-2024 - Statista U.S. population by sex 1980-2024 ... As of July 1, 2024, there were 168.34 million males and 171.77 million females living in the United States.
I'll search for female populations in the same timeframe.

</think>

Now I'll search for birth and death rates.

</think>

Result: [Doc 1](https://www.macrotrends.net/global-metrics/countries/usa/united-states/birth-rate):

U.S. birth rate 2023 - Statista Over the past 30 years, the birth rate in the United States has been steadily declining, and in 2023, there were 10.7 births per 1,000 of the ...
For death rates, I'll conduct a similar search.

</think>
<search> united states death rate 2012-2023</search>
